alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Huerfano and Las Animas Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of developing strong thunderstorms across central and eastern Las Animas County. These storms are nearly stationary, and will be capable of producing locally heavy rainfall and landspout tornadoes. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Aguilar, Cokedale, Kim, Branson, Starkville, Gulnare, Hoehne, Tyrone, Trinchera, Boncarbo, Model, Segundo and Weston. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
